title: SECLI CH/GVA - ISOLATION (SET USERS READ-ONLY) on PROD LIKE

task_list.instruction_title:
Please set the SECLI CH/GVA users in read only mode on PROD-Like

Note: Users read only is removed within IP Task [PRE-14463](PRE-14463_116109734.html)
Communication to SECLI Satellites: To be done by SECLI team, that SECLI CH/GVA PROD-Like is in READ only mode
